mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENU VALUES (#{menu_code}, NEXT VALUE FOR menu_cnt, #{menu_name}, #{menu_price}, #{menu_ex}, #{menu_star})
mapper.update: UPDATE MENU SET menu_name = #{menu_name}, menu_price = #{menu_price}, menu_ex = #{menu_ex}, menu_star = #{menu_star} WHERE menu_no = #{menu_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO picture VALUES ((SELECT MAX(menu_no) FROM menu), #{filename})
mapper.select: SELECT filename FROM picture WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPTION VALUES (#{side_code}, NEXT VALUE FOR option_cnt, #{side_name}, #{side_price}, #{side_ex})
mapper.update: UPDATE OPTION SET side_name = #{side_name}, side_price = #{side_price}, side_ex = #{side_ex} WHERE side_no = #{side_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photo VALUES ((SELECT MAX(side_no) FROM OPTION), #{filename})
mapper.select: SELECT filename FROM photo WHERE no = #{no}
